bill.title: Disabilities: person-first terminology.
bill.description: An act to amend Sections 416.17, 1502.3, 1502.45, and 32132.96 of the Health and Safety Code, and to amend Sections 4094.2, 4094.5, 4094.7, 4801, 5585.10, 5600.3, 5695, 5695.2, 5698, 5731, 5852.5, 5855, 5856, 5860, 7501, 9544, 10213.5, 10260, 10281.5, 10381.5, 12301.8, 15660, 16507.3, 17732.1, 18358.10, 18358.15, 18358.20, and 18986.40 of, and to amend the heading of Article 5 (commencing with Section 4094) of Chapter 3 of Part 1 of Division 4 of, the heading of Article 5 (commencing with Section 5694.7) of Chapter 2.5 of Part 2 of Division 5 of, the heading of Article 6 (commencing with Section 5695) of Chapter 2.5 of Part 2 of Division 5 of, and the heading of Article 7 (commencing with Section 5698) of Chapter 2.5 of Part 2 of Division 5 of, the Welfare and Institutions Code, relating to disabilities.

history.action: From printer. May be heard in committee March 3.
In committee: Set, first hearing. Hearing canceled at the request of author.
